description:
This course was recently described as one of the best courses on the web by skilledup.

  • Is creating a website putting you off starting your own online business?
  • Do you think you need to hire an expensive designer to do it for you?
  • Do you think doing it yourself will take time, money and look amateruish?

Did you know you can easily create your own WordPress website with integrated blog in half a day?

This course will show you step by step how to create a mobile-responsive, professional WordPress website from scratch with no coding experience needed. It is really easy - I promise!

Just watch what I do and copy me.

When I started my online business, I struggled for ages trying to create a website using a premium WordPress theme, but it was so difficult to do as the theme was too complicated.

If you want to set up an eCommerce site or something fancy, you would probably need a premium theme, but if you just want to increase visitors to your website and start building your list, this course is going to save you time. money and a lot of heartache!

With the help of this course, you can design your own WordPress website in under half a day with no technical knowledge or coding experience needed!

And it will only cost you the price of your domain and hosting, which is much cheaper than you think!

We will be using a FREE WordPress theme to create a beautiful, mobile-responsive website complete with email list-building functionality, so you can start to build your mailing list to promote your products and services or start up your own affiliate marketing business.

I will be with you every step of the way as you follow what I do in each of the videos.

This course is for you if you want to start a part-time online business, or if you want to design WordPress websites for other people.

In this course, you will learn:

  • How to create a professional, mobile-responsive WordPress website from scratch
  • How to create an email sign-up box to help build your mailing list
  • How to design a beautiful web header using FREE online software
  • How to create an integrated blog page
  • How to install plugins to help improve your website's functionality
  • How to write effective SEO-friendly blog posts
  • How to use Google analytics to make sure your website is attracting visitors

...and much much more!

It doesn't matter if you've never done anything like this before, I will go through each stage from installing WordPress onto your domain, to creating the pages and menus you will need to make your website look professional.

I will also show you how you set up pages and posts so you can easily manage your website by yourself, going forwards, saving you money.

This course will give you everything you need to set up your WordPress website so that you can start to promote yourself and your products easily and effectively.

As a bonus for enrolling on this course, you will receive a FREE Psychological Sales Secrets eBook containing sales secrets used by the most successful online marketers.

This course includes a discussion forum where you can share tips with other students and you also get the opportunity to ask me questions!

I would love for you all to share links to your websites so you can give each other supportive feedback and help your websites get some exposure.

I am here to support you. Please feel free to ask me questions...I really want to help!

The course comes with a certificate of completion, which you can put on your CV to show potential employers, if you want to start a career as a web designer.

This course has an unconditional 30 day money back guarantee, so there is ZERO risk to enrolling in this course!

So what have you got to lose? Enrol today and take the first steps to an exciting new business.
title: WordPress Made Easy: Design a website and build a list
